title: Poster, "No one makes it easier for you to make a buck selling chickens.", 1987
description: Image of a dollar bill with a portrait of Perdue instead of Washington, and above: THE FATHER OF OUR POULTRY. Below, in black ink: NO ONE MAKES IT EASIER FOR YOU TO MAKE A BUCK SELLING CHICKEN; blocks of text below this. Perdue logo, lower right.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "No one makes it easier for you to make a buck selling chickens.", 1987. Lithograph on paper. 1987-24-12.
